text: Generally, studying in a classroom is less distracting compared to other places
ipa: ˈʤɛnərəli, ˈstʌdiɪŋ ɪn ə ˈklɑːsrʊm ɪz lɛs dɪsˈtræktɪŋ kəmˈpeəd tuː ˈʌðə ˈpleɪsɪz

text: For example, studying at home can easily lead to watching television
ipa: fɔːr ɪgˈzɑːmpl, ˈstʌdiɪŋ æt həʊm kæn ˈiːzɪli liːd tuː ˈwɒʧɪŋ ˈtɛlɪˌvɪʒən

text: In a dorm, other students may prefer playing games to studying
ipa: ɪn ə dɔːm, ˈʌðə ˈstjuːdənts meɪ priˈfɜː ˈpleɪɪŋ geɪmz tuː ˈstʌdiɪŋ

text: In a cafeteria, many people are laughing and telling jokes
ipa: ɪn ə ˌkæfɪˈtɪərɪə, ˈmɛni ˈpiːpl ɑː ˈlɑːfɪŋ ænd ˈtɛlɪŋ ʤəʊks

text: Overall, school is a more ideal place to focus on learning
ipa: ˈəʊvərɔːl, skuːl ɪz ə mɔːr aɪˈdɪəl pleɪs tuː ˈfəʊkəs ɒn ˈlɜːnɪŋ
